Question: HRS HYDROGEN REFUELING SOLUTIONS CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HRS HYDROGEN REFUELING SOLUTIONS

- Europe’s leading designer and manufacturer of hydrogen refueling stations
- Participating in CES 2024 to showcase innovative solutions in hydrogen mobility
- Chosen by the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Region to present at CES 2024
- Founded in 2004, committed to reducing transport emissions
- New Champagnier site with mass production capacity for up to 180 units a year
- 2022/2023 revenue of €30.1 million, 135 employees as of June 30, 2023
Summary_cn:
HRS 氢燃料站解决方案

- 欧洲领先的氢燃料站设计制造商
- 参加2024年CES，展示在氢动力出行方面的创新解决方案
- 被奥弗涅-罗讷-阿尔卑斯大区选中，在2024年CES上进行展示
- 成立于2004年，致力于减少交通尾气排放
- 新的尚皮涅生产基地具备年产180套设备的能力
- 2022/2023财年营收为3,010万欧元，截至2023年6月30日拥有135名员工
